function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Integration of mobility patterns into epidemiological transmission models","Impact":"Inaccurate representation of disease spread and effectiveness of control measures","Mitigation":"Use additional data sources and models to validate and calibrate the mobility patterns","Technologies":"Data analytics, simulation models","People":"Epidemiologists, public health officials","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Inaccurate representation of healthcare facility utilization by sick individuals","Impact":"Ineffective allocation of healthcare resources and overcrowding of facilities","Mitigation":"Conduct surveys and analysis to understand healthcare-seeking behavior, improve accessibility to healthcare facilities","Technologies":"Survey tools, GIS mapping, healthcare utilization models","People":"Healthcare administrators, public health planners","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, local government"},{"Description":"Assumption of fixed daily visits to locations and healthcare facilities","Impact":"Underestimation of disease exposure and transmission risk at different times of the day","Mitigation":"Incorporate time-dependent factors into mobility and healthcare utilization models","Technologies":"Dynamic modeling, real-time data collection, time-series analysis","People":"Modeling experts, public health researchers","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"}]}
